title: Flight World Simulator v1.012
description:
Flight World is not a flight simulator in a traditional sense!

This is a commercial jet liner game with innovative game play designed for handheld devices. 

The special features will keep you busy and entertained as you will be challenged to also maintain the comfort of the flight service inside the aircraft.

Game play:

- Fly either using manual or autopilot, following air traffic controller's instructions to reach your destination
- Keep your passengers happy by serving food on a timely manner within first class, business class and economy class
- Challenge yourself by keeping the plane clean and tidy, therefore living up to the customers' happiness in flying with your aircraft
- Responding to passengers triggering the flight attendants' calls and their comments
- Watch out for areas of turbulence

Real life flying experience:

- The entire world with height data and satellite imagery (internet connection required)
- All major airports and runways - you can select departure and destination points as you wish
- Multiple aircrafts and airlines 
- Air Traffic Controllers guidance (spoken and text) for all countries helping you to navigate safely to your destination
- Real time and real world weather update while you fly (internet connection required)
- Weather settings for offline gaming
- Easy to use instrument landing system (ILS)

ATC language support: English, German, French, Spanish, Swedish and more to come!

More info:
 <a href="
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.flight.worldsim" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.flight.worldsim</a>


Instructions:

1.Install the APK
2.Copy 'com.flight.worldsim' folder to 'Sdcard/Android/Obb'
3.Launch the Game
